data: Richard Moyer, senior partner of the firm of Moyer & Perkins, read that letter over twice before he called in the man who had helped him make the importing of high grade groceries from England a most profitable business for over twenty years.
Keller, David H. (David Henry), 1880-1966; Kotzky, Alex, 1923-1996 [Illustrator]
